ing: Ing kakung hovercraft katmu yang igat

a: Our mission: to enable everyone, everywhere to understand the world and express themselves across languages.
ing: Ing misyun mu: pamaglub, mamilet king kekatamung tau, ketamu, at pamagpamie kareng language a buri.

a: Our mission: to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.
ing: Ing misyun mu: aliwan ya reng pamamie, panyalungsaring balen a tutuki at kakabaldugan ya king tau.

a: Thank you for your patience while we investigate shipment
ing: dakal a salamat keng kekang pasensya habang manimbistiga kami kening bagon
